hints.delete: Delete your account won't delete your videos. You must delete your videos before deleting your account if we want so.

description.create: A user is a person who can connect to the platform. You can create a user and give him a role to give him access to the platform.

helper.avatar: Choose an avatar for your profile
helper.username: A username that will allow you to be identified
helper.email: An email address that will allow you to connect to the platform
